channel.title: Yet Another News Letter
channel.description: Recent content on Yet Another News Letter

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Why yet another newsletter? Why not? How is it going to be structured? First few issues will be loosely structured just for me to experiment with the format. I want to keep this newsletter byte sized. I will talk about sofware as well as other things apart from software that will make one a better developer. Since I am not going to talk about any specific topics, I will include some tags or highlights in beginning of each newsletter so that reader will get an idea and it saves their time.

item.title: indexintro
item.description: Hi I am Naren. You probably should’ve seen me somewhere on internet as @DudeWhoCode, or probably not. Either way this is an opininated newsletter on my journey in software engineering, learnings, personal growth, experiments, articles and of course funny thoughts on bi-weekly basis. Subscribe here Enter your email address
